characteristics: Distinct citrus chracter with notes of grapefruit
storability: Retains 50%-55% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20 degrees C
resistant_to: Resistant to downy mildew and Peronospora
style_guide: India Pale Ale, Pale Ale, Heffeweisen, American Ales, Lagers, Californian Common, Bitters
name: Ahtanum
